title: "Note to Self" feature not saving notes in default app when using Assistant
content:
When I type "Note to Self" in the google search bar on my Pixel 3 XL, a card is pulled up where I can write a note and it is saved in my specified note-taking app (MyLifeOrganized). 

But...

When I use Google Assistant to save a note, by saying "OK Google", then, "Note to Self...," the Assistant saves the note in some default Google notes app (one that allows you to save "Lists" and "Notes"). I don't seem to be able to change the default note-taking app used with the Google Assistant interface. 

Help would be appreciated!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
